price: Ti, doista, ne možeš dati Uputu kome bi ti volio, jer Allah upućuje koga On hoće, i On najbolje zna one koji će Uputu slijediti.
arabic: إِنَّكَ لَا تَهۡدِي مَنۡ أَحۡبَبۡتَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: innaka lā tahdī man aḥbabta walākinna al-laha yahdī man yashāu wahuwa aʿlamu bil-muh'tadīna
